page.title: 14SUTTON VENY FLOWER SHOW
page.content:
The Flower Show in Sutton Veny is something that happens once a year in August on the field by the village hall. The adults take fruit and vegetables to be judged in the competitions. The things we do for the competitions in the show are paintings and designs, flower arranging and cooking.
They sell drinks, ice-cream, sweets and popcorn. They have games to play. In one game you have to throw three balls into a goldfish bowl, another game you throw balls into a clowns face. There is usually a lucky dip where you always win something. At the end of the show they give out cups for the best flowers, pictures,vegetables and cooking.
